text: Moreover, demons came out of many, crying out and saying, “You are the Christ,Perhaps 1.5% of the Greek manuscripts, of objectively inferior quality, omit “the Christ” (as in NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc.). the Son of God!” But rebuking them He would not allow them to continue speaking, because they knew that He was the Messiah.I find this to be curious: the demons kept telling the truth about Jesus, but He evidently did not want testimony from that quarter. But it seems that the demons felt compelled to identify Him—I wonder why.
